item.title: Korea's Largest Exchange Korbit Introduces Ethereum Wallet
item.description:
Korea's Largest Exchange Korbit Introduces Ethereum Wallet

Korbit first introduced Etereum trading on March 25, exactly a month ago from today. Korea's largest bitcoin exchange has become the country's first startup to showcase an Ethereum wallet for users to withdraw and deposit Ether with greater convenience. Korbit first introduced Etereum trading on March 25, exactly a month ago from today.

item.title: Trade24 - Forex Trading Services for Noobs - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Trade24 - Forex Trading Services for Noobs - NEWSBTC

Forex is a very attractive way of investing and having some returns. Nowadays, the Forex Markets have been attracting many Bitcoin traders. Since the Forex Market has an enormous liquidity and it is practically non-stop, it enables traders to maintain their activity 24 hours per day.

item.title: BTCPOP are Listening
item.description:
BTCPOP are Listening

In just 12 months, BTCPOP has skyrocketed to being the best and most successful Bitcoin P2P lending company. With a total of 11,972 funded loans and 17,241 satisfied users, BTCPOP can proudly claim that it has more satisfied users and more loans funded than any other site.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Risk of Further Declines - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Risk of Further Declines - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price dived sharply during the past two sessions. ETH/USD broke a major support, which may now act as a sell zone. Ethereum price dived sharply during the past two sessions. ETH/USD broke a major support, which may now act as a sell zone.

item.title: European Union Pushes Away Bitcoin Regulation for Now - NEWSBTC
item.description:
European Union Pushes Away Bitcoin Regulation for Now - NEWSBTC

The European Union is not in a hurry to implement Bitcoin regulations as they are not sure about the potential of bitcoin and its underlying technology. Read more... The European Union is not in a hurry to introduce Bitcoin regulations in its territory, decided the lawmakers earlier today.

item.title: Japanese Firms Hit by China's Capital Control May Flock To Bitcoin
item.description:
Japanese Firms Hit by China's Capital Control May Flock To Bitcoin

For example, if a foreign company wanted to export items to China, they will not be able to do so due to capital control. The financial turmoil in China is far from over by the look of things, and tighter capital control over foreign companies in the region are being enforced.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Scalps on this Evening - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Scalps on this Evening - NEWSBTC

Here's what we are looking to trade in the bitcoin price this afternoon. In this morning's bitcoin price watch piece focusing on today's session, we noted that as a result of action overnight, we would be tightening our range, and approaching the market with a pure breakout strategy (rather than a combination of our breakout and our intra-range approaches).

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Intrarange and Breakout - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Intrarange and Breakout - NEWSBTC

Here's what we are looking to trade in the bitcoin price today, Wednesday 27. It's that time of day again - the time for the first of our twice-daily bitcoin price watch analyses. Action overnight - as we will discuss shortly - was pretty flat, and we didn't manage to get on the right end of any sustained movement.
